note.query: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT Bar_Code FROM dm.Dim_Product WHERE Bar_Code IS NOT NULL AND Bar_Code<>'''' AND IsEnabled=1 GROUP BY Bar_Code HAVING(COUNT(1)>1) )x
note.title: [Notification] Product information issues
note.body:
dm.Dim_Product表可能有Active且Barcode相同的SKU_ID， 或者有Active，但是有必要字段为空的SKU_ID（Product_Sort，Product_Category，Bar_Code，Brand_Name，Sale_Scale）。
SELECT Bar_Code FROM dm.Dim_Product WHERE Bar_Code IS NOT NULL AND Bar_Code<>'''' GROUP BY Bar_Code HAVING(COUNT(1)>1)
